name: VeriCenter
overview: VeriCenter is a leading provider of managed hosting, colocation, and IT outsourcing services for mid-size to-large enterprises. From their nationwide network of seven premier data center facilities, they provide a comprehensive scope of managed services including management of servers, storage, backups, network, databases, and security to more than 600 business customers in a broad range of industries. Their centralized service delivery model provides a better way to achieve reliability, scalability, and cost-effectiveness for your IT infrastructure in support of enterprise applications, Web sites, software-as-a-service (SaaS) applications, disaster recovery solutions, and general business infrastructure. They are ideally positioned to guide your enterprise through the industry evolution toward utility computing.

funding_rounds.source_description: Pharos Capital Invests $7 Million in VeriCenter, a National Data Center Services Provider
